help:
Return the metadata of a dataset (package) and its resources.

    :param id: the id or name of the dataset
    :type id: string
    :param use_default_schema: use default package schema instead of
        a custom schema defined with an IDatasetForm plugin (default: False)
    :type use_default_schema: bool

    :rtype: dictionary

result.title: Car Parks

organization.description: Industry Association for car parking in UK and Europe. We represent, promote and influence the best interests of the parking and traffic management professions.
organization.title: British Parking Association
organization.name: british-parking-association

result.name: car-parks-bpa
result.notes:
British Parking Association provides data on car parks that achieves its Park Mark Award. In the UK, a quarter of car parks have achieved the Park Mark Award.  That's 5,000 of an estimated 17,000 - 20,000 car parks across the country where people regularly park their vehicles.

As part of a data sharing exercise we are making available the data of all Park Mark® accredited car parks to authorised third parties to offer for use with their applications. 

The data file includes details of all Park Mark accredited car parks, the name of operator, address of car park, type of car park (e.g. Multi Storey, surface), payment method (on foot, free, pay and display, number of spaces including disabled spaces and opening times.

extras.value: 111100: United Kingdom (England, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland)
